title: Online Mathematics Lecture Quality Design Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Development of an educational curriculum systematically incorporating quality elements when designing online mathematics lectures for pre-service and in-service teachers

learning_goals: Learners apply quality criteria (autonomy, collaboration, creative problem-solving) ≥80% effectively when designing online math courses.
In LMS environments, learners resolve ≥3 quality issues in math course design using team-based collaboration strategies.
Through qualitative research-based analysis, learners diagnose autonomy vs. collaboration dilemmas in online math course design with 70% accuracy.

resources: Digital content templates for math education

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
